items.name: Bread Salad
items.description: Bread with croutons. Extra crunchy. And stop asking for lettuce, we don't have any.

items.name: Bread Sandwich Sandwich
items.description: Bread between two slices of bread, then put between another two slices of bread. Yum.

items.name: Bread Pudding
items.description: It's really just left-over high-hydration dough, but don't tell the customers that. No, don't put that on the website. No one will buy it if they know it's just dough. Stop writing this down. Hey, I said stop. Okay pack your things, Jerry, you're fired.
